THE WORLD STAGE.Definition: the international level, the global scene

PACKS A SIZABLE PUNCH.Definition: has a big effect or strong influence

COMPULSORY.Definition: something you must do, not optional

CAVEAT.Definition: a warning or condition; something to be careful about

EXCEPTION.Definition: something that does not follow the rule

ENROL IN.Definition: sign up or register for something

APPRENTICESHIP.Definition: a period of learning a job by working with someone skilled

INSIST.Definition: say strongly that it must happen

MIDDLEMAN.Definition: an organisation between two others or sides; a go-between

FIGURE OUT.Definition: understand or find the answer to

FIT.Definition: something that matches well or is suitable

GRILLED.Definition: questioned in a serious or detailed way

RANKED.Definition: given a position or level on a list, rated or classified

PECULIARITY.Definition: something that is strange or special

THE SKY IS THE LIMIT.Definition: there is no limit; anything is possible

READING AROUND.Definition: reading extra books or articles to learn more about it

BACK AND FORTH.Definition: talking from one person to another repeatedly

GAINFUL EMPLOYMENT.Definition: paid work, a job that gives money
